data.message: Does Facebook have lottery promotion Division?

replies.message: Hey Bill, this sounds like a hoax. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1QKSwwz. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Abby

Facebook Hi, I have a page Kenneth Bogner New, N I for got the pass word but the woman I was living with wrote all this bad stuff about me on my page, please tell me how to get on that page n clean all that stuff about me that's not true!!! why would I write all that stuff about myself ? I was a very a # 2 world boxer well known n would never put anything like that on my page, Please either clean that off or help me get on tyher page n I think I remember the p/w but can't get on the paghe...,
Hey, Kenny. If you can't log into Facebook and need to reset your password, follow these steps: on.fb.me/1bnAHvo. -Rhea
